remarks: Lemma for ~ prdsms .  The distance function of a product structure is an extended metric.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Aug-2015.)
statement:
prdsxms.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsxms.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
prdsxms.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. Fin ) $.
prdsxms.d $e |- D = ( dist ` Y ) $.
prdsxms.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
prdsms.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> MetSp ) $.
prdsmslem1 $p |- ( ph -> D e. ( Met ` B ) ) $.
